      • scaledGeometryReductionIntersection

        public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry scaledGeometryReductionIntersection(java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> geoms)
        Make an intersection of a list of Geometry and catch TopologyException to redo the intersection with a reduced precision. Precision reduction comes from 2 to 1000.
        Parameters:
        geoms - List of Geometry
        Returns:
        the intersected Geometry

      • getPolygon

        public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry getPolygon(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geom)
        Get Geometry as a Polygon. If it already is a Polygon, returns it. If a MultiPolygon, returns the biggest Polygon Geometry of the list.
        Parameters:
        geom -
        Returns:
        the Geometry as a Polygon

      • getPolygons

        public static java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> getPolygons(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geom)
        Get geometry as a Polygon. If it already is a Polygon, returns it. If a MultiPolygon, return the list of polygons.
        Parameters:
        geom - input geometry
        Returns:
        a list of Polygon Geometry
